sourcing.instructions: Germanium: Can be sourced from semiconductor material suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: Germanium: Can be sourced from semiconductor material suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a precision scale.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once the material is solidified, use a diamond saw to cut the sample to desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches).
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once the material is solidified, use a diamond saw to cut the sample to desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches).
